FuncDef: The display service-scheme command displays the configuration of service schemes. The display service-scheme command displays the configuration of service schemes.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a service scheme.
The service scheme must already exist.

ExtraInfo: The display service-scheme command displays the configuration of service schemes. Before applying a service scheme to a domain, run the display service-scheme command to check whether the service scheme meets requirements.
